verses.text: Often \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* fought \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* youth, \w let|strong="H1980"\w* Israel \w now|strong="H1980"\w* say.

Often \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* fought against \w me|strong="H0398"\w* \w from|strong="H0398"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* youth: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* could \w not|strong="H3588"\w* prevail over \w me|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5439"\w* wicked \w have|strong="H1121"\w* wrought \w upon|strong="H0802"\w* \w my|strong="H5439"\w* \w back|strong="H1004"\w*: they \w have|strong="H1121"\w* lengthened \w their|strong="H5439"\w* iniquity.
\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* just \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w the|strong="H3588"\w* necks \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sinners:
Let \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* confounded \w and|strong="H3068"\w* turned back \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hate Sion.

Let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* grass \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tops \w of|strong="H1121"\w* houses: which withered \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* plucked \w up|strong="H7200"\w*:
Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand: nor he that gathereth sheaves his bosom.
And they that have passed by have not said: The blessing of the Lord be upon you: we have blessed you in the name of the Lord.
